ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RIGHT( Website , 4) <> ".COM", RIGHT( Website, 4) <> ".com", RIGHT( Website, 4) <> ".ORG", RIGHT( Website, 4) <> ".org", RIGHT( Website, 4) <> ".NET", RIGHT( Website, 4) <> ".net" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Web Site must have an extension of .com, .org, or .net .
